verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> Then came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֧י <S%H7626><s%> all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> to David חֶבְר֑וֹנָה <S%H2275><s%> unto Hebron וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and spake לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנְנ֛וּ <S%H2005><s%> behold עַצְמְךָ֥ <S%H6106><s%> Behold we [are] thy bone וּֽבְשָׂרְךָ֖ <S%H1320><s%> and thy flesh אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> ourselves

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again אֶתְמ֣וֹל <S%H865><s%> before time גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again שִׁלְשׁ֗וֹם <S%H8032><s%> before that time בִּהְי֨וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> when Saul מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> was king עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> over אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you [הָיִיתָה כ] (הָיִ֛יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) [מֹוצִיא כ] (הַמֹּוצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> after ק) [וְהַמֵּבִי כ] (וְהַמֵּבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> abide ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לְךָ֗ אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> You תִרְעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> to thee Thou shalt feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> my people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a לְנָגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> and thou shalt be a captain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> So all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> to the king חֶבְר֔וֹנָה <S%H2275><s%> to Hebron וַיִּכְרֹ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> made לָהֶם֩ הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and king דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> David בְּרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> a league בְּחֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> with them in Hebron לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּמְשְׁח֧וּ <S%H4886><s%> and they anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> David לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> [was] thirty שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> years דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H4427><s%> [and] he reigned

בְּחֶבְרוֹן֙ <S%H2275><s%> In Hebron מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> he reigned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> over Judah שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> and six חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> months וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem מָלַ֗ךְ <S%H4427><s%> he reigned שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty וְשָׁלֹשׁ֙ <S%H7969><s%> and three שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> over all Israel וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> and Judah

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וַֽאֲנָשָׁיו֙ <S%H376><s%> and his men יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַיְבֻסִ֖י <S%H2983><s%> unto the Jebusites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> which spake לְדָוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> thou shalt not come in הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo הֱסִֽירְךָ֗ <S%H5493><s%> Except thou take away הַעִוְרִ֤ים <S%H5787><s%> the blind וְהַפִּסְחִים֙ <S%H6452><s%> halt לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> hither thinking לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> cannot come in דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> here

וַיִּלְכֹּ֣ד <S%H3920><s%> took דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> Nevertheless David אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מְצֻדַ֣ת <S%H4686><s%> the strong hold צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> that עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> the same [is] the city דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Whoever מַכֵּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> and smiteth יְבֻסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> the Jebusites וְיִגַּ֣ע <S%H5060><s%> Whosoever getteth up בַּצִּנּ֔וֹר <S%H6794><s%> to the gutter וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפִּסְחִים֙ <S%H6455><s%> and the lame וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣עִוְרִ֔ים <S%H5787><s%> and the blind [שְׂנֹאו כ] (שְׂנֻאֵ֖י <S%H8130><s%> enemy ק) נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> [he shall be chief and captain] Wherefore they said עִוֵּ֣ר <S%H5787><s%> The blind וּפִסֵּ֔חַ <S%H6455><s%> and the lame לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall not come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> into the house

וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> So David בַּמְּצֻדָ֔ה <S%H4686><s%> in the fort וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> and called לָ֖הּ עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> it the city דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> built דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּלּ֖וֹא <S%H4407><s%> from Millo וָבָֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> and inward

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> on דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David הָל֣וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> greater וְגָד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and grew great וַיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with פ

וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <S%H7971><s%> sent חִירָ֨ם <S%H2438><s%> And Hiram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king צֹ֥ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre מַלְאָכִים֮ <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִד֒ <S%H1732><s%> to David וַעֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> trees אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> and cedar וְחָרָשֵׁ֣י <S%H2796><s%> and carpenters עֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> trees וְחָֽרָשֵׁ֖י <S%H2796><s%> artificer אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones קִ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> mason וַיִּבְנֽוּ־ <S%H1129><s%> and they built בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> David

וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> perceived דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֱכִינ֧וֹ <S%H3559><s%> had established יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> him king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וְכִי֙ <S%H3588><s%> for נִשֵּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and that he had exalted מַמְלַכְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4467><s%> his kingdom בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> the sake עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> for his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel's ס

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> took דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> And David ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more פִּֽלַגְשִׁ֤ים <S%H6370><s%> [him] more concubines וְנָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> and wives מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> out of Jerusalem אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after בֹּא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> he was come מֵחֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> from Hebron וַיִּוָּ֥לְדוּ <S%H3205><s%> born ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> and more לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> to David בָּנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> and there were yet sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these שְׁמ֛וֹת <S%H8034><s%> And these [be] the names הַיִּלֹּדִ֥ים <S%H3209><s%> of those that were born ל֖וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> unto him in Jerusalem שַׁמּ֣וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> Shammua וְשׁוֹבָ֔ב <S%H7727><s%> and Shobab וְנָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <S%H2984><s%> Ibhar וֶאֱלִישׁ֖וּעַ <S%H474><s%> also and Elishua וְנֶ֥פֶג <S%H5298><s%> and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3309><s%> and Japhia
וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <S%H476><s%> And Elishama וְאֶלְיָדָ֖ע <S%H450><s%> and Eliada וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <S%H467><s%> and Eliphalet פ

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> But when the Philistines כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָשְׁח֨וּ <S%H4886><s%> that they had anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> came up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> all the Philistines לְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> and David וַיֵּ֖רֶד <S%H3381><s%> [of it] and went down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמְּצוּדָֽה׃ <S%H4686><s%> to the hold

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> The Philistines בָּ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> also came וַיִּנָּטְשׁ֖וּ <S%H5203><s%> and spread בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> themselves in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> of Rephaim

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> enquired דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> And David בַּֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַאֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> Shall I go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines הֲתִתְּנֵ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> for I will doubtless בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> into thine hand וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> unto David עֲלֵ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> Go up כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתֹ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> deliver אֶתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> will certainly אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> your hand

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came דָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> And David בְּבַֽעַל־ פְּרָצִים֮ <S%H1188><s%> to Baalperazim וַיַּכֵּ֣ם <S%H5221><s%> smote שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there דָּוִד֒ <S%H1732><s%> and David וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> them there and said פָּרַ֨ץ <S%H6555><s%> hath broken forth יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבַ֛י <S%H341><s%> upon mine enemies לְפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> me as the breach מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of waters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> Therefore he called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּ֥עַל פְּרָצִֽים׃ <S%H1188><s%> Baalperazim
